duties_responsibilities.duty: Play a critical role in the success of the survey group and the execution of projects of varying size, detail, and complexity.
Collaborate with Project Managers to provide input during the proposal and project planning phase, establish project scope, budgets, staffing, and project schedule.
Utilize AutoCAD Civil 3D and related engineering software packages to complete assignments on time and within prescribed standards and budgets.
Review survey field calculations and adjust as needed.
Effectively communicate with internal staff, contractors, inspectors, and team leaders to maintain a dynamic team environment.
Attend paid training and development events, industry conferences, and networking opportunities.

education_certification.credential: LSIT or PLS is desired, not required
